---
title: What is Notte?
---

<Tip>Explore our GitHub repository [https://github.com/nottelabs/notte](https://github.com/nottelabs/notte) and star us ðŸŒŸ</Tip>

Notte is the platform for building and deploying reliable [Web AI Agents](/concepts/agents) that can act and scrape on any site.
Notte provides everything you need to automate repetitive workflows at really large scale with a single API. Stealthly cloud browser sessions, proxies, secure credential management, and seamless integrations with AI tools in the ecosystem.

<CardGroup cols={3}>
  <Card title="Quickstart" icon="rocket" href="/intro/quickstart">
    Launch your first Notte agent in minutes with our quickstart guide.
  </Card>
  <Card title="Python SDK" icon="python" href="/intro/python-sdk">
    Manage sessions, agents and vaults with our Python SDK.
  </Card>
  <Card title="Integrations" icon="robot" href="/integrations/mcp">
    Connect web agents to Claude, Cursor, OpenAI and more AI tools.
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

---

## Key Features

A fullstack platform for secure, scalable, and intelligent web automation:

**Sessions & Infra:**
- **Cloud Browser Sessions:** Instantly launch and manage headless browsers in the cloud. Integrate with Playwright CDP, manage cookies, and replay sessions.
- **Granular Page Control:** Observe, act, and scrape functions any web page.
- **Session Replay:** Debug and audit with visual replays and live viewers.
- **Stealth:** Built-in proxies, control geolocation, and CAPTCHAs solving.

**Agents & Tooling:**
- **Web AI Agents:** LLM-powered agents to automate any web workflow.
- **Credential Vaults:** Securely store credentials and 2FAâ€”never exposed to LLMs.
- **BUA Model:** Our Browser Using Agent inference model working on DOM and vision.
- **Personas:** Email and Phone for automated onboarding and account creation.
- **Storage:** Upload and download files to securely store and manage any data.
- **Memory:** Persistent storage for long-running and multi-task workflows.

**More:**
- **MCP Server:** Run your own model control plane for custom LLM integrations.
- **Integrations:** Native support for Claude, Cursor, OpenAI CUA, Langchain, and more.
- **Enterprise:** SOC-2 compliant with comprehensive audit trails. On-prem options.
